name: Cryptovalues Societ√† Consortile a r.l.
goal:
Cryptovalues is a new Consortium with the objective to provide legislators/regulators high level of competency in the blockchain business and cryptocurrencies/tokens financial markets.

Among its members, we do have long term experts in the following fields: Legal, fiscal and established industry members

Main goal is to create a new regulated European industry without jeopardizing its potentials
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Taxation
euInitiatives:
All blockchain related projects with particular focus on :

EU Blockchain Observatory and Forum

https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/en/eu-blockchain-observatory-and-forum
